boardgame.name: Ascending Empires
boardgame.description: Humanity has been at each other's throats since time immemorial. Now in another galaxy humans wage war amongst themselves again but this time with the aid of alien technology found on other planets. Ascending Empires offers a nice mixture of building exploring and development along with combat via a simple dexterity element. Ascending Empires is sure to sate the desire for a space empire building game that plays simply yet deeply._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The last survivors of the Human race have fled to a new galaxy in fear of annihilation at the hands of an unstoppable enemy. Now, having discovered the ruins of four long dead civilizations spread across the stars, the race to develop technology based on the alien relics has begun. Humans will once again ascend to the stars to claim the galaxy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players will colonize new worlds by building colonies, cities, and research facilities. They will develop new Technologies, and build up fleets of Starships. Ascending Empires is a fast paced game that utilizes a dexterity based Starship movement and combat system, and allows for many different strategies to be explored._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7065) Humanity has been at each other_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s throats since time immemorial. Now, in another galaxy, humans wage war amongst themselves again, but this time, with the aid of alien technology found on other planets. Ascending Empires offers a nice mixture of building, exploring, and development, along with combat via a simple dexterity element. Players flick their starships into orbits around planets to defend or attack them or surround enemy ships to destroy them. Ascending Empires is sure to sate the desire for a space empire building game that plays simply yet deeply.

Reserved for happyuser2000 Shrink removed from the box. Board pieces have not been removed from shrink or the giant zip-locks. This is as close to new as it gets for this OOP gem. Box is in good condition with some slight shelf wear.

Played twice. All components and box in pristine condition. This includes the untouched spare set of planet/asteroid/ship stickers. This comes from a smoke-free home and has been meticulously cared for. The 4 corner pieces of the board have been tested for best fit and labeled accordingly on the back side with barely-visible black permanent marker according to quadrant. This particular board lays perfectly flat. Includes 4 sets of glass beads to replace the original ships (which themselves are also included in case you prefer wooden pucks over the beads). The battleships have not been replaced. I ship promptly and pack with loving care to ensure the game reaches you in the same condition it was when shipped. Shipping quote upon request. Combined shipping available, please browse my inventory! Local pickup available in Portland, Oregon. Serious inquiries only, please. Photo album: http://imgur.com/a/WKWYj#0 The photos depict the box corners in worst condition -- one on top and one on bottom. The two corners depicted are the only ones showing any wear. The photos of the marked board pieces show clearly that they are marked with greek letters in black marker on the backs. These are barely visible unless angled into the light. The photos also show the original ships in a separate bag, having been replaced with glass beads of each color in the bags with the rest of the player pieces. This item can be shipped in a large flat rate USPS box. For more secure packaging, a parcel in the neighborhood of 16_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; by 16_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; by 8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; with fluffy cushioning around the game within is recommended.

Please let me know if you have any questions.
